publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5572.1 Jackie Baillie: Prescription Charges and NHS Spending Priorities with Particular Reference to Health Visitorsâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5572) in the name of Mary Scanlon, leave out from "withdraw" to end and insert "immediately implement free prescriptions for cancer patients as has been the case in England since April 2009."
